# Description

Small bug not respecting the API limit.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f0d6bbc8-b9bc-463f-a836-7ed9a79904c5)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Fixed

- When deploying more than 100 `WorkflowVersions` Toolkit no longer
gives a `CogniteAPIError: Maximum 100 items are allowed per request. |
code: 400`.

## templates

No changes.
